page.title: 08CHILDREN'S TOYS - BOYS.
page.content: I am 4. I like my{bike.}It has stabilisers. I only ride in the garden I am 5. My favourite toy is a track on which{electric model cars}are raced I am 6. I like a{board game}called Guess Who. Two players ask questions about faces printed on cards. I'm 7. I like my{remote control car. It turns using an aerial and hand set. I am 8. My favourite toy is Lego, {little plastic bricks}which join together to build all kinds of things. I am 9 and I like my two-geared{pedal {powered go-cart. I'm 10 and I like a hand-held {electronic game}in which you shoot aliens to score points. I am 11 and my favourite toys are small{plastic figures}about 7 cms high from popular science fiction films.
